statements: SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT trading_id, strategy_name FROM trading_strategies WHERE trading_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name FROM trading_strategies WHERE trading_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY trading_id DESC;
SELECT trading_id, strategy_name FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%trend%';
SELECT trading_id, strategy_name, market_data FROM trading_strategies WHERE trading_id = 1
SELECT strategy_name, trend_analysis FROM trading_strategies WHERE market_data->'volume' > 10000
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name ILIKE '%long' ORDER BY trading_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT strategy_name FROM trading_strategies WHERE market_data->'price' BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT trading_id, strategy_name, trend_analysis FROM trading_strategies WHERE market_data->'volume' < 5000 AND trend_analysis->>'indicator' = 'Bullish'
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, analysis_period FROM trading_strategies WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, risk_level FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price_change > 0;
SELECT market_trend, volume FROM market_data ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, analysis_period FROM trading_strategies WHERE analysis_period < 100 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_level FROM trading_strategies WHERE risk_level = 2 AND analysis_period > 50;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price_change > 1000 ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT market_trend, price_change FROM market_data WHERE volume > 50000 ORDER BY price_change DESC, data_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT stock_symbol, trade_type, trade_volume FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100;
SELECT trade_id, trade_price, trade_date FROM trades WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(trade_volume) AS average_volume, MAX(trade_price) AS max_price FROM trades;
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%uptrend%';
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_volume > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_price ASC
SELECT stock_symbol, trade_type, AVG(trade_price) AS avg_price FROM trades GROUP BY stock_symbol, trade_type HAVING AVG(trade_price) > 500 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_type, trade_volume, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_date >= '2021-01-01' AND trade_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY trade_id
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE data_type LIKE 'volume%' ORDER BY data_value DESC, data_timestamp ASC
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_start_date < '2021-06-01' AND trend_end_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY trend_name
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM market_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT timestamp, symbol, volume FROM market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description, strategy_name FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT trend_type, start_date, end_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT symbol, price, volume, timestamp FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY created_on ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Bullish' AND start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT result_id, profit_loss FROM strategy_results WHERE strategy_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, price, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, timestamp, NOW()) AS seconds_since_update FROM market_data WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, profit FROM strategy_performance ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, entry_price, exit_price FROM trade_history WHERE profit_loss < 0;
SELECT trend_name, trend_score, trend_end FROM market_trends WHERE trend_score > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, volume, price FROM market_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT symbol, profit_loss FROM trade_history WHERE profit_loss < 0 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY profit_loss ASC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, win_rate, profit FROM strategy_performance WHERE win_rate >= 0.75 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY current_price DESC, total_value ASC LIMIT 5;
